description: metal bank with seated Betsy Ross in a blue dress holding a 13 star American flag; lever on back; American flag moves back and forth
inscription:
Inscription 

molded into front base, in raised letters: [Betsy Ross]
molded into bottom of base in raised letters: [1776-1976/ A Needle Fights For Freedom/ BETSY ROSS BICENTENNIAL BANK/ LIMITED EDITION OF 500  33/ illegible signature/ MADE IN USA]
title: "Betsy Ross Bicentennial Bank" mechanical bank
